
	"item_mjz_chinese_gold_1"
	{
		"ID"							"70160"	
		"BaseClass"						"item_lua"	//"item_datadriven"
    	"ScriptFile"                    "items/item_mjz_chinese_gold.lua"
		"Model"							"models/props_gameplay/gold_coin001.vmdl"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"mjz_chinese_gold_origin"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"

		"ItemCost"						"100"
		"ItemShopTags"					"mjz;gold"
		"ItemQuality"					"artifact"
		"ItemAliases"					"gold"
		"ItemDeclarations"				"DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_TEAMMATES | DECLARE_PURCHASES_IN_SPEECH | DECLARE_PURCHASES_TO_SPECTATORS"
		"ShouldBeSuggested"				"1"
		"ItemShareability"              "ITEM_FULLY_SHAREABLE"	//可分享
		"ItemKillable"                  "0"						//不可A
		"ItemPurchasable"               "1"						//可以买
		"ItemSellable"                  "0"						//不可卖
		"ItemStackable"					"0"						//不可叠
		"ItemDisassembleRule"			"DOTA_ITEM_DISASSEMBLE_ALWAYS"	//可以拆分
		"MaxUpgradeLevel"				"5"
		"ItemBaseLevel"					"1"
	}
